title: Fears Law Founder Earns National Recognition in Lawdragon 500 Leading Plaintiff Consumer Lawyers in America Guide | Business Wire
text: DALLAS--( BUSINESS WIRE )-- Fears Law , a national law firm based in Dallas, proudly announces the selection of firm founder Bryan Fears to the 2024 edition of the Lawdragon 500 Leading Plaintiff Consumer Lawyers in America. This list recognizes lawyers who show outstanding skills and make a significant impact on their profession. “At Fears Law, we are committed to helping our clients navigate the complex legal system while providing exceptional service,” said Mr. Fears. “Our reputation and results reflect that commitment.” Mr. Fears, who earned repeat recognition for plaintiffs work, focuses his practice on business litigation and personal injury cases. He is consistently recognized for excellence in personal injury litigation by The Best Lawyers in America and Texas Super Lawyers, published by Thomson Reuters. His trial team focuses on motor vehicle accidents, truck accidents, and catastrophic injury cases as well as premises liability, dog bite cases and workplace accidents and injuries, advocating for those who have been hurt by the negligence of others. Lawdragon is a digital media company that publishes guides of the nation’s leading lawyers as well as news and reporting on the legal industry. Selections for the Lawdragon 500 Leading Plaintiff Consumer Lawyers in America are made based on a combination of industry analysis, nominations and peer review. About Fears Law: Fears Law is a dynamic legal team focusing on a variety of both litigation and business law matters. The firm represents a diverse set of clients, levying justice in an array of areas. For more information, visit fears.com .
